title: Wear Fap Counter
summary: The First Wear Fap Counter: ergonomic and minimal
developerAddress: Via don Luigi Sturzo 13 / c, 20019, Settimo Milanese (MI), Italia
description: Some people may ask: what's the use of a Smartwatch?I have the answer: Wear Fap Counter.Wear Fap Counter is the first fap counter for Android Wear. It counts your faps telling you performance and time.Minimal, ergonomic, well-designed.
descriptionHTML:
Some people may ask: what's the use of a Smartwatch?

I have the answer: Wear Fap Counter.

Wear Fap Counter is the first fap counter for Android Wear.
It counts your faps telling you performance and time.
Minimal, ergonomic, well-designed.
comments: Best invention since sliced bread. Havent stopped fapping since I got this. God bless the devs and god bless America. Thank you so much use this app on the daily. #thefappening #whoneedsthegym? #kateupton also it would be hella tight if you could make a watchface and replace all the numbers with fap so it says its fapping time or have an analog clock with the seconds hand designed as a fist and its stuck so it looks like its fapping :) anyways thank you and bye ; D #whoneedsagirlfriend? #igotmyhand #wheredoesthelotiongo? #honestlythebestapp
Smartband - doesnt work Thought it would work with Smartband since its considered Android Wear, but nope.
Simply stated, this is a brilliant and funny idea!
Ok but can be better Please add Google Fit and Google Play integration!
recentChanges: + Added Last session and Total Stats
+ Added Fapper-Level based on Army Rank
